summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 1995 CADILLAC SEVILLE.  WHILE DRIVING 20 MPH SMOKE WAS COMING FROM UNDER THE HOOD.  THE VEHICLE BURST INTO FLAMES AFTER BEING PULLED OVER.  THERE WAS NHTSA RECALL # 04V110000 (FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE: DELIVERY).  THE FIRE DEPARTMENT EXTINGUISHED THE FIRE.  THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE 140,000.
